Posts.Title: What do you do? chemo? masectomy? hunh? Methusala figsgirls

Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2009 09:32PM ManuelaP wrote: Stephanie, beautiful lady you are.  People can be so mean, hate 'em sometimes. (OK a lot of the time)  But then there are people like you that make life worth living.  You know what you need to do that's best for you.  Just do that.  Do what's best for you.  You need to live for you as my onc just told me.  I am still puzzled by that.  ~Manuela "God is With Us"
Posts.Title: I'm Done TripleNeg AliceJean

Posts.Content: Dec 18, 2007 05:36PM ManuelaP wrote: I am just wondering, did you have the BRCA genetic testing done and know for sure that it is genetic?    I thought mine was genetic but it is not.  It's hard to see your family suffer to death from cancer and then get it yourself.  It is not necessarily genetic however.  I saw a genetic counselor and had the test; I suppose it eases the mind a little.
